name: A bridge to the taste!
description: Patra is surrounded by mountains touched gently by the sea in its edges. In the recent years, the connection with the Rio-Antirio bridge, contributed to its development and also stands as a stunning element. Although not a wide tourist destination, this lively town has plenty to offer any time of the year. There are a lot of places to choose from to enjoy a traditionally-made dish and taste local drinks, like tentoura (liquor) and wine especially from the Achaia Clauss Winery. At home, I can show you how to experiment with Greek tastes...
